RESUME
VASUMADHI.V                                                                                       
URAPPAKKAM
9962392366
Having 2years of experience in teaching kindergarten. Outgoing, creative 
and ambitious professional who loves children and pushes for positive 
growth. Experienced with both gifted and emotionally handicapped 
students. Completed  a certification course in identifying disability 
with children. Volunteers for everything!
EDUCATION, CERTIFICATION & TRAINING:
Pursuing Diploma in Elementary Education at NIOS. - 2017
Completed Advance Diploma in Montessori Training. – 2015 with 90%
Completed B.com at Madras University. – 2012- with 75%
 Attended “A CLASS APART”  KURUVILLA JACOB’S WORKSHOP, &
“GUARDIANS OF LIGHT”.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:
Focus on determining each child’s individual educational needs and 
development.
Improved method will be implemented to enhance the learning of the 
Letters, Sounds of the alphabet.
Each and every topic will be taught with lively experience and through 
concentrating on both Fine and Gross skill.
Reading corner will be adopted to improve reading skill.
Special concentrations and methods will be provided for handling 
gifted children.  
CIRCLE TIME will be conducted on daily basis to exercise  ETHRIC 
FORCE (DIVINE POWER WITHIN THE CHILD).Will concentrate on exercise along with academics which helps 
the children to cross “Mid line barriers”.
AREAS OF EXPERTISE: 
Early childhood development with 16 keys.
Use of manipulative.
Student assessment.
Role playing.
Motivating children.
Child friendly.
Parent teacher conference.
Co operative learning.
Study on motor and cognitive skills.
Handling on  disabilities.
Strengthening 12 senses.
HISTORY OF ORGANISATIONS:
Shree Niketan Patasala west tambaram  - 2017 May to present.
Holysai International – 2016 – 2017.
Kidscare International – 2015 June – 2016 November.PERSONAL INFORMATION:
